post.description:
¿Who determines the response status, and in what order?
Asynchronously
customer A: hello lifeplan, I'm signing these documents.
lifeplan: ok, gotcha. (200)
lifeplan (secretly): now I have to send this info to Clever!
lifeplan (to Clever): hey, customer A signed the contracts!
Clever: ...
lifeplan (to clever): hey clever!

Synchronously, then retry
customer A: hello lifeplan, I'm signing these documents.
lifeplan: ok, gotcha. Let me talk to clever first.
Lifeplan (to clever): Hey clever, I have something for you.
Clever: ...
lifeplan (to Client A): All done! (200)
lifeplan (secretly): I'll have to retry
lifeplan (to clever): hey clever!
etc

Synchronously, just fail
customer A: hello lifeplan, I'm signing these documents.
lifeplan: ok, gotcha. Let me talk to clever first.
Lifeplan (to clever): Hey clever, I have something for you.
Clever: ...
lifeplan (to Client A): I'm sorry (500)

get.description:
OpenApi3 schema for this API. Format can be selected via content negotiation.

- YAML: application/vnd.oai.openapi
- JSON: application/vnd.oai.openapi+json

is_superuser.title: Estado de superusuario
is_superuser.description: Indica que este usuario tiene todos los permisos sin asignárselos explícitamente.

is_staff.title: Es staff
is_staff.description: Indica si el usuario puede entrar en este sitio de administración.

is_active.title: Activo
is_active.description: Indica si el usuario debe ser tratado como activo. Desmarque esta opción en lugar de borrar la cuenta.

date_joined.title: Fecha de alta
date_joined.description: The date this user was created in the database

groups.title: Grupos
groups.description: Los grupos a los que pertenece este usuario. Un usuario tendrá todos los permisos asignados a cada uno de sus grupos.
